settings.menudiv: Simple Tower Defense game. Players can move using WASD or Arrow keys.

actions.comment: set tower as a global variable, so enemies can will move toward it
when a player leaves, destroy all units owned by that player

else.comment: give score to the owner of last attacking unit (player is the owner of a unit)

then.comment: if the dying unit is tower, then game's over

actions.comment: spawn enemies and command them to attack the base

message.textA: The base has been attacked! Remaining HP:
